title: Allianz Set to Start Increasing Dividends by at Least 5%
body:
Allianz SE will increase its shareholder dividend by at least 5% on year starting with this yearâ€™s payout, the German insurer said late Thursday.
Ahead of its capital-markets day Friday, Allianz set out its dividend policy, under which the regular payout remains at 50% of adjusted group net profit, but with a further objective of paying out at least 5% more each year than the year before. This will apply to the dividend for 2021, Allianz said.
